crossIndustry.label: Universal Principles
crossIndustry.title: The Fundamentals Apply Everywhere
crossIndustry.description: While industry context matters, the core principles of lean work in any environment where people do work:
principles: Waste exists in every process  - the types differ, but elimination strategies are similar
People closest to the work have the best ideas  - engagement works everywhere
Visual management creates transparency  - everyone benefits from clarity
Small improvements compound  - steady progress beats dramatic initiatives
